name: PT2050 Prototype
description:
VR Jam Austin 2019 submission!

Prototype development for the Planet Texas 2050 VR Experience. 

Begin the puzzle by pushing the right red button on the table in front of you, this will make the puzzle elements appear. Make the connection of the factors involved in Irrigation. You'll  have the elements Water[Blue], Electricity[Yellow], Urbanization[Orange], and Ecosystem[Green]. There are three connections between these elements that you must discover.  Answer is down below.

Control:

Click Grip Button to activate element

https://bridgingbarriers.utexas.edu/planet-texas-2050/

Requirements:

VR only

Answer:  Water[Blue] -> Urban[Orange]  ||  Urban[Orange] -> Eco[Green] || Water[Blue] -> Eco[Green]
